_header: Jesu God and Gods son / That were a babe I-born
_description: A Miracle of the Virgin Mary, a Lost Foot Restored — thirty-seven couplets or monorhyming quatrains

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
IEsu God and Godus soneÞat were a Babe I borenOf þe
                    Mayden swete MarieKuynde Qween I Coren…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now Ladi Marie qween of heueneAnd Emperisse of helleHelp
                    vs þat we mowe wiþ þeffor euere In Ioye dwelle
BodEngPoeta1.Note:
Mixed couplets and monorhyming quatrains; written in
                    half-lines.
